CLIENT: DUBLIN AIRPORT

CAMPAIGN: DA - NORTHERN IRELAND

THE PROJECT

This was a big campaign for Dublin Airport which brought awareness to many of the different destinations and number of flights on offer every year. A big challenge we came across during this project was that we were given extremely limiting specs on certain sites. This meant I had to create specific creatives for particular sites. One technique we made use of was polite loading which helped alleviate the issue. Working closely with the Art Director on this project was really important as we had to manage expectations carefully to ensure the quality of our work remained high whilst adhering to the limiting specs.

INVOLVEMENT & TECHNOLOGIES USED

  • LEAD ANIMATOR ON PROJECT
  • FILE-SIZE MANAGEMENT
  • POLITE LOADING
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JAVASCRIPT
  • ADOBE ANIMATE
  • PHOTOSHOP
